name: Swords and Sandals 5 Redux: Maximus Edition
description: Gladiator, it is time to go underground! For the first time ever, you shall step beyond the arena sands and into the dark dungeons of the world.Swords and Sandals V Redux, the latest thrilling installment in the world's greatest gladiator game series, has arrived!
minimum_requirements: OS: 2000 Processor: 500 MHZ Memory: 1 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
